attributes.action: Stop pussy footing around and ban fur imports from  China etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is impossible to placate UK residents on the subject of fur imported from countries with such barbaric animal welfare status.
 We petition the PM to take an ethical stance on this issue, and acknowledge the depth of feeling that UK residents have on the issue of the inhumane treatment of animals used for their pelts in certain countries.
 As long as this fur is imported to our country we are unwillingly party to such extreem cruelty.
Only financial loss will force their own governments to update their animal welfare laws.
I also petition the PM to stop rejecting  petitions on this issue !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
